where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%')

mapper.insert: insert into customer(id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, filename, newfilename, secret ) values(#{id}, (select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from customer b), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{filename}, #{newfilename}, #{secret} )
mapper.update: update customer set step=step+1 where ref=(select ref from (select ref from customer a where seq=#{seq}) A) and step>(select step from (select step from customer b where seq=#{seq}) B)
